title: A Quiet Revolution: 30 Years of Windham Hill (2005) 4CD
description:
â€˜Windham Hillâ€™ has been the home to acoustic instrumental music for 30 years. The pastoral beauty prized by Windham Hill is conjured by the moon-and-evergreens label logo, by the four volume titles here ("Elements," "Peace," "Artistry" and "Excursions") of these 67 Windham Hill favorites which define Windham Hill's core sound as "acoustically rooted music that is a blend of folk, classical and jazz influences."

The music on â€˜A Quiet Revolutionâ€™ is sorted by general style, not chronologically. Discs 1 and 2, â€˜Elementsâ€™ and â€˜Peaceâ€™, focus more on the label's pastoral textures, and disc 3 , â€˜Artistryâ€™,  explores more ambitious or ensemble pieces, while Disc 4, â€˜Excursionsâ€™ explores the latter-day vocal stylings and traces of smooth jazz.  



Various Artists

A Quiet Revolution:

30 Years of Windham Hill

4-CD Boxed Set

2005
